channel.description: Recent content in QRCode on Ricky

item.title: Why are QR Codes with capital letters smaller than QR codes with lower-case letters?
item.description:
Why are QR Codes with capital letters smaller than QR codes with lower-case letters?

  • If you want the smallest possible physical size for a QR code which contains a URl, make sure the text is all in capital letters.
